meanings.sent1: The ulcerating wound on his leg was painful.
meanings.sent2: Her ulcerating skin condition required medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The ulcerating sore on the dog's paw made him limp comically.
meanings.sent4: The ulcerating emotions in her heart were like a festering wound.
meanings.sent5: The ulcerating sore on the tree trunk was a stark reminder of decay.

meanings.sent1: The ulcerating bacteria in the food made many people sick.
meanings.sent2: The ulcerating substance in the chemical was harmful to the skin.
meanings.sent3: The ulcerating sauce in the dish gave it an unexpected kick.
meanings.sent4: The ulcerating words he spoke left a lasting impact on her.
meanings.sent5: The ulcerating agent in the product was found to be corrosive.
